heart_server module¶

heart_server.heart_rate()¶

Add a heart rate to the database for a given patient via post

Returns:json indicating success adding heart rate, or error message
heart_server.interval_average()¶

calculate the average heartrate since a given time via post

Returns:json containing the average, or error message
heart_server.new_patient()¶

add a new patient to the patient database via post

Returns:json indicating success adding patient, or error message
heart_server.patient_status(patient_id)¶

check whether a given patient is tachycardic

Parameters:patient_id – integer ID of patient to check tachycardic status
Returns:json indicating whether patient is tachycardic, or error message
heart_server.return_avg_rate(patient_id)¶

access database to get last heart rate recorded for patient

Parameters:patient_id – integer ID of patient to get heart rates from
Returns:json with the last heart rate for patient, or error message
heart_server.return_heartrates(patient_id)¶

access database to get heart rate history for a patient

Parameters:patient_id – integer ID of patient to get heart rates of
Returns:json with the heart rate list for patient, or error message

Heart Rate Sentinel Server
